TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SdlChannelSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
Public Class SdlChannelSink Implements IChannelSinkBase, IServerChannelSink

summary.span: 提供在服务器上动态生成 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的服务器信道接收器的实现。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server channel sink that generates Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dynamically on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 用于在 URL 以字符串的结尾位置的情况下创建 WSDL"？ wsdl"。The is used to create WSDL in situations where the URL ends with the string "?wsdl". 下表显示通道可以为此通道接收器指定的配置属性。The following table shows the channel configuration properties that can be specified for this channel sink. 前两个属性组合可用于控制 WSDL 发布的发布的应用程序域的对象。The first two properties combine to control the WSDL publication of objects published by the application domain. 如果`false`指定的第一个属性，则没有 WSDL，则返回，而不考虑第二个属性。If `false` is specified for the first property, no WSDL is returned, regardless of the second property. （默认值为 `true`。）否则，第二个控制是否允许全局元数据对象 URI 进行响应。(The default is `true`.) Otherwise, the second controls whether the global metadata object URI is permitted to respond. （默认值为 `false`。）(The default is `false`.) |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`metadataEnabled`|一个布尔值，指定是否遵守请求以结尾的"？ wsdl"如果此接收器是通道接收器链中。A Boolean value that specifies whether to honor requests that end in "?wsdl" if this sink is in the channel sink chain. 默认设置为 `true`。The default setting is `true`. 如果为 `false`，则只要为应用程序域中的任何对象请求元数据，接收器就会引发异常。If `false`, the sink throws an exception in all cases where metadata is requested for any object in the application domain.

在以下平台上只有 .NET Framework 1.1 版才支持该属性：Windows 98、Windows NT 4.0、Windows Millennium Edition、Windows 2000、Windows XP Home Edition、Windows XP Professional、Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 family.| |`remoteApplicationMetadataEnabled`|一个布尔值，指定是否遵守对象 URI 请求"RemoteApplicationMetadata？ wsdl"，它由应用程序域返回描述发布的所有对象的 WSDL。A Boolean value that specifies whether to honor requests for the object URI "RemoteApplicationMetadata?wsdl", which returns WSDL that describes all objects that are published by the application domain. 如果`false`，对"RemoteApplicationMetadata.rem"任何请求将引发异常。If `false`, then any request to "RemoteApplicationMetadata.rem" throws an exception. 所有其他"？ wsdl"对于特定对象的 Uri 的请求需要。All other "?wsdl" requests for particular object URIs are honored. 如果值为 `true`，则接受全局元数据请求。If `true`, the global metadata request is honored. 默认设置为 `false`。The default setting is `false`.

在以下平台上只有 .NET Framework 1.1 版才支持该属性：Windows 98、Windows NT 4.0、Windows Millennium Edition、Windows 2000、Windows XP Home Edition、Windows XP Professional、Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 family.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理的作业是将转换为消息对象调用它的方法调用。The proxy's job is to convert a method call that is invoked on it into a message object. 消息对象，该实现对象接口时，传递从客户端到服务器端通过调用对消息接收器对象。The Message object, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 消息的接收器被链接在一起，这意味着每个消息接收器负责调用对下一个消息的接收器后它已执行其工作。Message sinks are chained together, which means that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after it has performed its work. 例如，与同步相关的消息接收器可能会导致锁获取或发布并委派给下游消息接收器。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink might cause a lock to be acquired or released and delegated to the downstream message sink. 当格式化程序通道接收器获取一条消息，需要通过通道发送，它调用，将消息作为参数传递。When the formatter channel sink gets a message that needs to be sent over the channel, it calls , passing the message as a parameter. 格式化程序接收器然后创建的传输标头数组和调用上格式化程序接收器。The formatter sink then creates the transport header array and calls on the formatter sink. 此调用沿接收器链向下转发，并且任何接收器均可创建将被传递回格式化程序接收器的请求流。This call is forwarded down the sink chain, and any sink can create a request stream that is passed back to the formatter sink. 完成此操作后调用返回后，消息序列化，接收器链中的第一个链调用和消息传递到通道接收器。After this call returns, the message is serialized, is called on the first chain in the sink chain, and the message is passed to the channel sinks. 通道接收器收到消息后，它们可以将数据写入到流、 将标头添加到标头的数组，并转发到下一步接收器调用之前将自己添加到接收器堆栈。After the channel sinks get the message, they can write data to the stream, add headers to the header array, and add themselves to the sink stack before forwarding the call to the next sink. 当调用达到传输接收器链末尾时，传输接收器发送标头，并通过到服务器，此过程被反转其中通道序列化消息。When the call reaches the transport sink at the end of the chain, the transport sink sends the headers and serialized message over the channel to the server, where the process is reversed. 当消息到达服务器端时，传输接收器将检索标头和序列化流中的消息并将这些通过接收器链转发，直到到达格式化程序接收器。When the message reaches the server side, the transport sink retrieves the headers and serialized message from the stream and forwards these through the sink chain until they reach the formatter sink. 然后，格式化程序接收器反序列化消息，并将其转发给远程处理，其中消息转变为方法调用，该服务器对象调用。The formatter sink then deserializes the message and forwards it to remoting, where the message is turned into a method call and the server object is called.
